text: Regé-Jean Page (born 24 January 1988) is a British actor. He is mostly known for playing the role of Simon Basset in the Netflix series Bridgerton. Page also appeared as Guy Braxton in the BBC One school-based drama series Waterloo Road. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:British actors Category:Actors from London
title: Regé-Jean Page
